content:
Yes, La Taverna dei Fori Imperiali has a few signature dishes and must-tries that you shouldn't miss. Here are some recommendations:

1. Spaghetti alla Carbonara - This classic Roman pasta dish is made with spaghetti, eggs, Pecorino cheese, guanciale (cured pork jowl), and black pepper. La Taverna dei Fori Imperiali's version is considered to be one of the best in the city and is a must-try. 2. Saltimbocca alla Romana - This delicious dish consists of thin slices of veal topped with prosciutto and sage, and cooked in a white wine and butter sauce. It is a classic Roman dish that is sure to delight your taste buds. 3. Abbacchio alla Romana - This dish features tender roasted lamb cooked in a garlic and rosemary sauce, and is another Roman classic that is not to be missed. 4. Cacio e Pepe - This simple yet delicious pasta dish is made with spaghetti, Pecorino cheese, and black pepper. It is a staple of Roman cuisine, and La Taverna dei Fori Imperiali's version is particularly outstanding. 5. Tiramisu - This classic Italian dessert is made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and a creamy mascarpone filling. La Taverna dei Fori Imperiali's tiramisu is considered to be one of the best in the city, and is the perfect way to end your meal. These are just a few of the many delicious dishes that you can try at La Taverna dei Fori Imperiali. The restaurant also offers a great selection of wine and other traditional Roman dishes, so be sure to ask your server for recommendations based on your preferences.
